TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IErrorLog

Docs.summary: Implemented to contain any errors when retrieving printer settings to populate an object used by a custom data importer.

remarks.para: A custom data importer is created by implementing the interface. For more information about programmatically importing data into an InfoPath form, see the InfoPath Developer PortalMicrosoft Office Developer Center.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddError (string pszPropName, ref stdole.EXCEPINFO pExcepInfo);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddError([in]string pszPropName, [in]valuetype stdole.EXCEPINFO& pExcepInfo) runtime managed
Public Sub AddError (pszPropName As String, ByRef pExcepInfo As EXCEPINFO)
public: void AddError(System::String ^ pszPropName, stdole::EXCEPINFO % pExcepInfo);
abstract member AddError : string * EXCEPINFO -> unit

Docs.param: The name of the property that raised the error.
A pointer to the exception that was raised when the error occurred.
Docs.summary: Used to add errors in an implementation of the interface used in a custom data importer.

remarks.para: A custom data importer is created by implementing the interface. For more information about programmatically importing data into an InfoPath form, see the InfoPath Developer PortalMicrosoft Office Developer Center.
